info.name: New Skinny Google Bar
info.description: This is a slightly modified version of the Skinny Google Bar removes the logo and disables it in gmail and a couple other things. I really don't know how to make user styles I accomplished this from trial and error so I hope it works for you guys. All credit goes to devinnnwashere for the original script which can be found here http://userstyles.org/styles/57287/skinny-google-bar
